/usr/bin/c++    -g   -Wall -O2  -lpthread -lrt -ltinyxml -lglog CMakeFiles/plsa_train.dir/plsa_train.o CMakeFiles/plsa_train.dir/util.o CMakeFiles/plsa_train.dir/plsa.o  -o plsa_train  -L/home/zhounan/project/ict/plsa/plsa/lib -rdynamic -ltinyxml -Wl,-Bstatic -lglog -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/home/zhounan/project/ict/plsa/plsa/lib
